jobs.title: Senior Product Manager, Tracking Experience
jobs.descriptionHtml:
HEY THERE!

At YAZIO, we’re on a mission to help millions of people around the world live healthier, happier lives through better nutrition. With over 80 million downloads and users in 150+ countries, we’re building the most successful nutrition app worldwide. 🚀

To take our product to the next level, we’re looking for a (Senior) Product Manager to join our newly established Tracking Experience (TX) Squad. This is a unique opportunity to shape one of the core areas of our app that impacts millions of daily food and activity tracking experiences.

Let's shape the future of nutrition together and make YAZIO the most successful nutrition app worldwide!

This role is 100% remote and open to candidates based in Germany, Spain, Portugal or the U.K.

YOUR MISSION

As the (Senior) Product Manager for our TX Squad, you’ll play a crucial role in driving the future of how users interact with our tracking features—from AI-powered food tracking to fasting, recipes, diary and activity tracking. You’ll collaborate closely with engineers, designers, data analysts and fellow PMs to craft user experiences that are simple, engaging and life-changing.

Here’s what you’ll be working on:

  • Reimagining tracking: Own and evolve our tracking features (food, activity, fasting, recipes, diary) with a focus on usability, creativity and delight

  • Harnessing AI: Drive innovation in AI food tracking, working on features that simplify everyday nutrition for millions of users

  • Experimenting at scale: Frame hypotheses, create rapid prototypes and A/B tests with your squad and translate insights into impactful product decisions

  • Leading ideation: Run ideation sessions, create product tickets in Jira and pitch ideas at product reviews to bring concepts to life—sometimes within weeks

  • Optimizing funnels: Analyze user behavior and funnels, uncover why users drop off and create solutions that guide them toward healthy habits

  • Cross-functional collaboration: Partner with designers, engineers, Product Ops, Localization, CRM and other squads to deliver seamless, scalable features

  • Driving clarity: Keep the squad aligned with clear roadmaps, updated tickets and structured communication across stakeholders

YOUR PROFILE

We’d love to meet you if you:

  • Bring 3+ years of Product Management experience in a mobile B2C environment, ideally with a strong focus on user funnel optimization and data-driven growth

  • Have a track record of impact, with measurable outcomes that show how your product decisions moved the needle

  • Are highly skilled in A/B testing, funnel analysis and deriving insights from user data

  • You're curious to experiment with AI to achieve faster results and streamline workflows, while also understanding its limitations

  • Balance creativity and structure: You enjoy brainstorming bold ideas but also know how to manage deadlines, roadmaps and cross-team rituals

  • Thrive in dynamic environments where things change quickly—you’re resilient, adaptable and energized by experimentation

  • You are an excellent communicator who can simplify complexity, keep stakeholders aligned and inspire your squad to deliver

WHY US?

  • An exciting product with millions of users in over 150 countries, driven by our mission to transform the world through healthy eating

  • A remote-first setup: work 100% from home, join a co-working space or work abroad for several weeks per year

  • 30 vacation days to relax and recharge, plus 5 child sick days if your little one needs you

  • A focus-driven culture that values efficiency over long hours—no overtime expectations, and if it happens, you get that time back!

  • A high-impact environment where your work drives real change—short decision-making processes and no micromanagement

  • A team culture where ambition and balance go hand in hand, supported by strong connections—from our fully covered company retreat to team meetups and virtual coffee breaks

  • Tools and support to do your best work: MacBook, monitor and €1,000 annual learning budget, plus regular feedback and career development

  • A truly international team with English as our company language and a shared commitment to growth and well-being—supported by Sunday Supplements and Nilo Health

Diversity and Inclusion

At YAZIO, we believe that diversity fuels innovation. We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment where everyone, regardless of gender identity, race, religion, age, sexual orientation or ability, feels valued and empowered. We celebrate different perspectives and actively encourage individuals from all backgrounds to apply.

READY TO JOIN US?

Excited to take YAZIO to the next level and help people worldwide lead healthier lives? We’d love to hear from you! Please send us:

  • Your CV in English

  • A few lines (or a short video if you prefer) about who you are and why you want to work at YAZIO

  • Any additional materials that showcase your work (e.g., LinkedIn profile, portfolio)

jobs.title: (Senior) Product Manager, Growth
jobs.descriptionHtml:
HEY THERE!

At YAZIO, we’re on a mission to help millions of people live healthier, happier lives through better nutrition. With more than 80 million downloads worldwide, we’re building the most successful nutrition app out there. 🚀

To fuel this journey, we’re looking for a (Senior) Product Manager to join our Growth Squad. This squad plays a critical role in making YAZIO engaging from day one, ensuring that every user has a smooth onboarding, stays motivated and experiences long-term value.

Let's shape the future of nutrition together and make YAZIO the most successful nutrition app worldwide!

This role is 100% remote and open to candidates based in Germany, Spain, Portugal or the U.K.

YOUR MISSION

As Product Manager in the Growth Squad, you’ll be responsible for driving retention, onboarding and overall funnel performance across our mobile app. You’ll collaborate closely with engineers, designers, analysts, CRM and product leadership to craft experiences that keep users coming back, forming lasting habits and ultimately subscribing.

Here’s what you’ll be working on:

  • Boosting onboarding & retention: Optimize the user journey from first download to long-term engagement, identifying blockers and opportunities at every step

  • Experimenting at scale: Lead ideation, design structured A/B tests and translate results into actionable product improvements

  • Data-driven growth: Partner with analysts to understand key metrics (DAUs, conversion funnels) and use insights to prioritize impactful initiatives

  • Cross-functional collaboration: Work hand-in-hand with engineering, design, CRM and product leadership to bring growth strategies to life

  • Creative problem-solving: Use gamification, habit-building techniques and motivational design to turn nutrition tracking into a delightful daily habit

  • Rapid execution: Some ideas should go from concept to live experiment in just a couple of weeks—you’ll help make that happen

YOUR PROFILE

We’d love to meet you if you:

  • Bring 3+ years of Product Management experience, ideally in mobile B2C apps with a strong focus on growth and retention

  • Have a proven track record of running A/B tests, analyzing funnels and scaling data-driven product strategies

  • Are comfortable working with data (e.g., Looker, Amplitude or other BI tools) and translating insights into product decisions

  • Understand how to balance user experience with business growth goals, creating value for both

  • Are a strategic thinker with an agile mindset, able to pivot quickly when results or market trends demand it

  • Thrive in cross-functional teamwork, building strong relationships with engineers, designers, analysts and CRM

  • Bring creativity and curiosity, eager to test bold ideas that motivate and retain users

  • Are AI-savvy or curious about leveraging AI tools for product discovery, roadmap planning and faster iteration

  • A remote-first setup: work 100% from home, join a co-working space or work abroad for several weeks per year

  • 30 vacation days to relax and recharge, plus 5 child sick days if your little one needs you

  • A focus-driven culture that values efficiency over long hours—no overtime expectations, and if it happens, you get that time back!

  • A high-impact environment where your work drives real change—short decision-making processes and no micromanagement

  • A team culture where ambition and balance go hand in hand, supported by strong connections—from our fully covered company retreat to team meetups and virtual coffee breaks

  • Tools and support to do your best work: MacBook, monitor and €1,000 annual learning budget, plus regular feedback and career development

  • A truly international team with English as our company language and a shared commitment to growth and well-being—supported by Sunday Supplements and Nilo Health

At YAZIO, we believe that diversity fuels innovation. We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment where everyone, regardless of gender identity, race, religion, age, sexual orientation or ability, feels valued and empowered. We celebrate different perspectives and actively encourage individuals from all backgrounds to apply.

  • Any additional materials that showcase your work (e.g., LinkedIn profile, portfolio)

jobs.title: (Senior) Product Manager, Monetization
jobs.descriptionHtml:
HEY THERE!

At YAZIO, we’re on a mission to help millions of people live healthier, happier lives through better nutrition. With more than 80 million downloads worldwide, we’re building the most successful nutrition app out there. 🚀

To take this mission further, we’re looking for a (Senior) Product Manager to join our Monetization Squad. This team is at the center of how we connect user value with business impact, designing strategies and experiments that shape how YAZIO grows as a leading subscription app.

This role is 100% remote and open to candidates based in Germany, Spain, Portugal or the UK. Let’s shape the future of nutrition together and make YAZIO the most successful nutrition app worldwide!

YOUR MISSION

As (Senior) Product Manager in the Monetization Squad, you’ll own the strategies and experiments that directly impact our revenue streams, pricing models and conversion funnels. You’ll collaborate closely with engineers, designers, analysts, CRM and leadership to design data-driven solutions that maximize both user value and business impact.

Here’s what you’ll be working on:

  • Optimizing conversion funnels: Identify drop-off points, run experiments and ship improvements that increase free-to-paid conversion and subscription retention

  • Driving pricing strategy: Analyze competitive benchmarks, test new models and refine how we communicate value to users

  • Experimenting with monetization levers: Frame hypotheses, design rapid tests and translate insights into high-impact product decisions—sometimes going from idea to live experiment in just weeks

  • Balancing user value with business goals: Ensure monetization strategies are transparent, fair and aligned with our mission to help people live healthier lives

  • Collaborating cross-functionally: Work with engineers, designers, analysts and CRM to bring ideas from concept to reality

  • Data-informed decisions: Monitor and analyze key metrics (conversion rate, revenue per user, churn, funnel performance) to drive continuous improvement

YOUR PROFILE

We’d love to meet you if you:

  • Bring 4+ years of Product Management experience, ideally in subscription-based B2C apps (health, wellness, lifestyle, or similar)

  • Have a proven track record in monetization, pricing or conversion optimization with measurable results

  • Are highly skilled in A/B testing, funnel analysis and data-driven product decisions

  • Understand how to balance business impact with user trust, ensuring our monetization strategies feel seamless and supportive, not pushy

  • Have strong analytical skills and are comfortable working with tools like Growthbook or Omni.co

  • Thrive in cross-functional teamwork, influencing and aligning engineers, designers, analysts and stakeholders around monetization priorities

  • Proficient in using AI tools for analysis and discovery, with the mindset to continuously push the boundaries of what AI can do for monetization

  • Bring a growth mindset and resilience, knowing that small changes in monetization can lead to big results

WHY US?

  • An exciting product with millions of users in over 150 countries, driven by our mission to transform the world through healthy eating

  • A remote-first setup: work 100% from home, join a co-working space or work abroad for several weeks per year

  • 30 vacation days to relax and recharge, plus 5 child sick days if your little one needs you

  • A focus-driven culture that values efficiency over long hours—no overtime expectations, and if it happens, you get that time back!

  • A high-impact environment where your work drives real change—short decision-making processes and no micromanagement

  • A team culture where ambition and balance go hand in hand, supported by strong connections—from our fully covered company retreat to team meetups and virtual coffee breaks

  • Tools and support to do your best work: MacBook, monitor and €1,000 annual learning budget, plus regular feedback and career development

  • A truly international team with English as our company language and a shared commitment to growth and well-being—supported by Sunday Supplements and Nilo Health

DIVERSITY AND INCLUSION

At YAZIO, we believe that diversity fuels innovation. We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment where everyone, regardless of gender identity, race, religion, age, sexual orientation or ability, feels valued and empowered. We celebrate different perspectives and actively encourage individuals from all backgrounds to apply.

READY TO JOIN US?

  • A few lines (or a short video if you prefer) about who you are and why you want to work at YAZIO

  • Any additional materials that showcase your work (e.g., LinkedIn profile, portfolio)

jobs.title: Office Manager - Working Student / Part-Time
jobs.descriptionHtml:
HEY THERE

Are you a highly organized and hands-on person who enjoys creating structure and a welcoming environment? Then we’re looking for you! As our new Office Manager, you'll play a vital role in ensuring our Erfurt office runs smoothly and provide essential support for events, equipment, and onboarding processes. Become part of YAZIO’s mission to make it the most successful nutrition app worldwide—starting right from the heart of our team environment!

This role combines remote flexibility with on-site collaboration in Erfurt, ideally suiting candidates based in the surrounding areas.

YOUR MISSION

  • Handle office operations and take care of all incoming and outgoing physical mail in our Erfurt office

  • Support the organization of team-wide events such as company retreats, department and squad days

  • Manage the ordering and distribution of hardware and welcome packages for new team members

  • Support marketing efforts by organizing and shipping branded merchandise and marketing packages

  • Be the go-to person for everyday office needs and help cultivate a great employee experience on site in Erfurt

YOUR PROFILE

  • Currently studying (e.g., business administration, communications or a related field), or bring relevant experience from previous positions

  • Structured and independent way of working, with a strong sense of responsibility and attention to detail

  • Fluency in English and German, coupled with excellent written communication

  • A proactive mindset and problem-solving attitude

  • Reliable team player excited to contribute to a meaningful mission

  • You are available for approximately 16–20 hours per week. If you're a working student, you are open to working up to 40 hours per week during semester breaks.

  • Based in or around Erfurt with the flexibility to work from the office several days per week

WHY US?

  • An exciting product with millions of users in over 150 countries, localized in 20 languages

  • A remote-first culture, combines remote flexibility with on-site collaboration in Erfurt

  • An international team with English as our company language

  • Access to state-of-the-art technical equipment (laptop, external monitor, etc.)

  • High-impact work environment with short decision-making processes

  • A work culture characterized by focus and efficiency. We do not work overtime and, on the rare occasions this is necessary, you can take the additional hours off at another time.

DIVERSITY AND INCLUSION

At YAZIO, we believe that diversity fuels innovation. We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment where everyone, regardless of gender identity, race, religion, age, sexual orientation, or ability, feels valued and empowered. We celebrate different perspectives and actively encourage individuals from all backgrounds to apply.

READY TO JOIN US?

Excited to take YAZIO to the next level and help people worldwide lead healthier lives? We’d love to hear from you! Please send us:

  • Your CV in English

  • A few lines (or a short video if you prefer) about who you are and why you want to work at YAZIO

  • Any additional materials that showcase your work (e.g., LinkedIn profile, portfolio)

jobs.title: Senior Financial Accountant
jobs.descriptionHtml:

Let's shape the future of nutrition together and make YAZIO the most successful nutrition app worldwide!

This role is 100% remote and open to candidates based in Germany, Spain, Portugal or the U.K.

YOUR MISSION

As a Senior Financial Accountant at YAZIO, you’ll play a critical role in keeping our financial operations organized, compliant and scalable as we continue to grow across international markets. From recording invoices and reconciling accounts to supporting month-end and year-end closes and preparing tax filings, you'll ensure our financial data is timely, accurate and aligned with relevant regulations and accounting standards.

But you won’t just be crunching numbers. You’ll think beyond daily execution, refining and evolving our internal controls, collaborating with cross-functional teams to resolve operational gaps and helping build finance processes that support a fast-growing, digital-first business. You’ll work closely with banks, auditors and tax advisors while using and refining our accounting tech tooling to boost efficiency and keep our financial engine running smoothly.

YOUR PROFILE

  • 5+ years of experience in financial accounting, ideally in a high-growth digital business (apps, SaaS, tech)

  • Strong technical accounting knowledge, with solid experience in German GAAP and tax law (familiarity with international accounting standards like IFRS and/or US-GAAP is a plus)

  • Accounting tool proficiency with hands-on experience with DATEV and modern AP/AR tools like Spendesk (proficiency with ERP systems like NetSuite is a plus)

  • Excellent Excel skills and the ability to analyze and interpret financial data effectively

  • Strong understanding of regulatory compliance and internal control frameworks

  • Proactive mindset with a focus on process improvement and workflow optimization

  • Critical thinker with strong problem-solving skills

  • Exceptional precision, reliability and attention to detail

  • Degree in accounting, finance or a related field or certified training (e.g. tax clerk). Work experience in an accounting or audit firm is a plus.

  • Fluent in English and German with excellent written communication skills

WHY US?

  • An exciting product with millions of users in over 150 countries, driven by our mission to transform the world through healthy eating

  • A remote-first setup: work 100% from home, join a co-working space, or work abroad for several weeks per year

  • 30 vacation days to relax and recharge, plus 5 child sick days if your little one needs you

  • A focus-driven culture that values efficiency over long hours - no overtime expectations, and if it happens, you get that time back!

  • A high-impact environment where your work drives real change - short decision-making processes and no micromanagement

  • A team culture where ambition and balance go hand in hand, supported by strong connections - from our fully covered company retreat to team meetups and virtual coffee breaks

  • Tools and support to do your best work: MacBook, monitor, and €1,000 annual learning budget, plus regular feedback and career development

  • A truly international team with English as our company language and a shared commitment to growth and well-being - supported by Sunday Supplements and Nilo Health

DIVERSITY AND INCLUSION

At YAZIO, we believe that diversity fuels innovation. We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment where everyone, regardless of gender identity, race, religion, age, sexual orientation, or ability, feels valued and empowered. We celebrate different perspectives and actively encourage individuals from all backgrounds to apply.

READY TO JOIN US?

Excited to take YAZIO to the next level and help people worldwide lead healthier lives? We’d love to hear from you! Please send us:

  • Your CV in English

  • A few lines (or a short video if you prefer) about who you are and why you want to work at YAZIO

  • Any additional materials that showcase your work (e.g., LinkedIn profile, portfolio)

jobs.title: Head of Partnership Marketing
jobs.descriptionHtml:
HEY THERE

Are you a strategic, performance-focused leader with a passion for influencer and partnership marketing? Do you thrive in fast-paced environments and feel energized by building high-impact teams, driving automation and owning growth channels from strategy to execution? Then we’re looking for you!

At YAZIO, we’re on a mission to help millions of people worldwide live healthier lives through better nutrition—and we know partnerships are key to scaling our impact. As our new Head of Partnership Marketing, you’ll take full ownership of our global partnership strategy and team, shaping the influencer, creator, brand and affiliate landscape for YAZIO across key international markets.

This job is 100% remote and should be based in Germany.

YOUR MISSION

  • Lead, mentor and scale our international partnership team of 4+ people

  • Design and own our global partnership marketing strategy, from influencer activations and creator-led campaigns to affiliate collaborations and brand deals

  • Ensure partnerships drive measurable performance, reflected in ROAS and bookings—with a clear link to business growth

  • Champion AI-driven workflows and automation to scale the team and increase efficiency

  • Define partnership conditions as well as negotiate and execute deals

  • Directly interact with decision-makers for our targeted partners

  • Further develop and manage existing partnerships

  • Collaborate cross-functionally with Performance, CRM, Product, Brand & Finance to integrate partnerships into the broader growth engine

  • Continuously track market trends and discover scalable growth opportunities in emerging partnership models

  • Oversee budget planning, campaign forecasting and impact reporting

  • Act as the technical point of contact for partner tracking stack

YOUR PROFILE

  • Proven leadership experience: 3+ years of leading high-performing teams, ideally in influencer settings

  • Deep knowledge of influencer and partner ecosystem, including creator, affiliate and brand collaborations

  • Strong understanding of performance marketing KPI’s (CPM, ROAS, CAC) and campaign analysis

  • Tech & AI savvy mindset: confident using tools and building scalable, automated processes with AI and current martech solutions (e.g., for outreach, analytics, optimization)

  • Excellent communication & negotiation skills: the ability to effectively manage internal and external stakeholders, with strong negotiation and persuasion skills

  • Performance-focused, analytical and always thinking scale over manual work

  • Fluent in English with excellent verbal and written communication skills

  • Interest in fitness and nutrition is a plus

OUR CORE TECH STACK

  • Awin

  • Storyclash

  • Appsflyer, Omni

  • Notion, Asana

  • Google Suite

  • Slack

  • Various AI tools and models

WHY US?

  • An exciting product with millions of users in over 150 countries, driven by our mission to transform the world through healthy eating

  • A remote-first setup: work 100% from home, join a co-working space, or work abroad for several weeks per year

  • 30 vacation days to relax and recharge, plus 5 child sick days if your little one needs you

  • A focus-driven culture that values efficiency over long hours - no overtime expectations, and if it happens, you get that time back!

  • A high-impact environment where your work drives real change - short decision-making processes and no micromanagement

  • A team culture where ambition and balance go hand in hand, supported by strong connections - from our fully covered company retreat to team meetups and virtual coffee breaks

  • Tools and support to do your best work: MacBook, monitor, and €1,000 annual learning budget, plus regular feedback and career development

  • A truly international team with English as our company language and a shared commitment to growth and well-being - supported by Sunday Supplements and Nilo Health

jobs.title: Werkstudent:in Office Management
jobs.descriptionHtml:
HEY DU!

Bist du ein Organisationstalent mit Hands-on-Mentalität, das gerne Struktur schafft und eine einladende Atmosphäre gestaltet? Dann suchen wir genau Dich!

Als unsere neue:r Werkstudent:in Office Management spielst du eine entscheidende Rolle dabei, dass unser Erfurter Büro reibungslos läuft. Du unterstützt unser Team bei Events, der Ausstattung und Onboarding-Prozessen – und trägst so direkt zu YAZIOs Mission bei, die erfolgreichste Ernährungs-App weltweit zu werden – mitten aus dem Herzen unseres Teams heraus!

Diese Rolle verbindet Remote-Flexibilität mit Zusammenarbeit vor Ort in Erfurt – perfekt für Studierende aus der Region.

DEINE MISSION

  • Verantwortung für den reibungslosen Ablauf im Büro sowie die Bearbeitung eingehender und ausgehender Post in Erfurt

  • Unterstützung bei der Organisation von Teamevents (z. B. Company Retreats, Department Days oder Squad Days)

  • Verwaltung und Versand von Hardware sowie Welcome Packages für neue Teammitglieder

  • Unterstützung des Marketing Teams durch Organisation und Versand von Merchandise- und Marketing Paketen

  • Ansprechpartner:in für alle alltäglichen Bürotätigkeiten und Mitgestaltung eines großartigen Wohlfühlortes in Erfurt

DEIN PROFIL

  • Du bist aktuell eingeschriebene*r Student:in (z. B. in BWL, Kommunikationswissenschaften oder einem ähnlichen Fach) oder bringst relevante Erfahrungen aus vergleichbaren Tätigkeiten mit

  • Du arbeitest strukturiert, selbstständig und übernimmst gerne Verantwortung – mit einem Auge fürs Detail

  • Fließende Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse sowie sehr gute schriftliche Ausdrucksfähigkeit

  • Du hast eine proaktive, lösungsorientierte Haltung und packst gerne mit an

  • Du bist ein zuverlässiger Teamplayer, der Lust hat, zu einer sinnstiftenden Mission beizutragen

  • Du bist ca. 16–20 Stunden pro Woche verfügbar – während der Semesterferien gerne bis zu 40 Stunden

  • Du wohnst in oder um Erfurt und hast die Flexibilität, mehrmals pro Woche im Büro zu arbeiten

WARUM YAZIO?

  • Ein spannendes Produkt mit Millionen von Nutzer:innen in über 150 Ländern, lokalisiert in 20 Sprachen

  • Remote-first Kultur, kombiniert mit wertvoller Zusammenarbeit vor Ort in Erfurt

  • Ein internationales Team, Unternehmenssprache Englisch

  • Zugang zu modernster technischer Ausstattung (Laptop, Monitor etc.)

  • Eine Arbeitskultur mit kurzen Entscheidungswegen und hohem Impact

  • Fokus & Effizienz statt Überstunden – und falls es doch mal vorkommt, kannst du die Zeit später ausgleichen

DIVERSITY & INCLUSION

Bei YAZIO sind wir überzeugt: Vielfalt treibt Innovation voran.

Wir setzen uns für ein inklusives Arbeitsumfeld ein, in dem sich alle Menschen – unabhängig von Geschlecht, Identität, Herkunft, Religion, Alter, sexueller Orientierung oder Beeinträchtigung – wertgeschätzt und ermächtigt fühlen.

BEREIT, MIT UNS DURCHZUSTARTEN?

Du möchtest YAZIO aufs nächste Level bringen und Menschen weltweit helfen, gesünder zu leben?

Dann freuen wir uns auf deine Bewerbung! Bitte sende uns:

  • Deinen Lebenslauf

  • Ein paar Zeilen (oder ein kurzes Video) über dich und warum du bei YAZIO arbeiten möchtest

  • Optional: Weitere Materialien, die deine Arbeit zeigen (z. B. LinkedIn-Profil, Portfolio)
